businesses.name: Macelleria Richmond
businesses.business_details:
Macelleria arrived to Richmond in 2018 in the Swan St, being the first Macelleria steak
house in the state of Victoria. From the beginning, Macelleria has wanted to offer truly tender
steaks and an unbeatable selection of burgers. What we offer is Australia’s
most desirable meat restaurant and a unique eating experience of uncompromising quality.

At Macelleria we strive to be the best experience in real food and people. When you dine
at Macelleria you will experience uncompromised quality, food that is great and healthy,
the provenance and traceability of our food, an ethical approach, personalisation and our
expertise.
businesses.product_details:
Macelleria is the ultimate steakhouse, located right in the heart of Swan Street. The
perfect spot for a corporate working lunch or a pre-game dinner, Macelleria
Richmond serves up the highest quality, freshest Aussie produce and lives up to our
defining motto of “the butcher that cooks for you.” Menu mainstays include tender
steaks and juicy burgers that will leave you wanting more.
businesses.new_products:
- Changed operating hours: now open Monday to Sunday from 12:00pm to 9:00pm during
coronavirus crisis.
- New products and services: We are pleased to share that we are now offering our
uncooked meats and frozen homestyle meals.
- New online store: https://ordermate.online/macelleriarichmond/menu
